input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Gender has a direct effect on department competitiveness and peanut allergy. Department competitiveness has a direct effect on peanut allergy. We know that male gender causes non-competitive department. male gender or competitive department causes being allergic to peanuts. Would the applicant is allergic to peanuts if male gender instead of non-male gender?
